amendment.description: Amendment reduces the appropriation for Air Force family housing by $6.9 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of June 15, to reduce funding for the Air Force family housing by $6.9 million. The intent of the amendment is to eliminate funding for 33 new senior officer dwellings at an average cost of $208,000 per unit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neumann amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 266 - 160 (Roll no. 397).
